name: Time traveller
description:
This is my first Unity project realized for my first GameJam : MiniJam#44

You were about to celebrate new year with your friends and suddenly saw a big blue light. You just woke in a plane. You will have to find the time portals to go back to your time...

Because I do suck so much in media resources, all images and musics in my game were free to use. Musics are from Youtube free library .

I have so much to learn, but I loved this little challenge. Hope didn't do anything wrong. This is pretty new to me.
